mapper.insert: insert into PICKER_REQUEST (id, creator, create_date, deleted, target_url, target_type, batch_no, status) values (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{deleted}, #{targetUrl}, #{targetType}, #{batchNo}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from PICKER_REQUEST where deleted = '0' and status = #{status} order by create_date asc limit 1
mapper.update: update PICKER_REQUEST set last_modifier = #{lastModifier}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate}, deleted = #{deleted}, result_id = #{resultId}, status = #{status}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from PICKER_REQUEST where deleted = '0' and creator = #{creator}
select * from PICKER_REQUEST where deleted = '0' and creator = #{creator} order by create_date desc
